item.title: Prayer AB11356 in English
item.description: ##Infants O Thou peerless Lord! Let this suckling babe be nursed from the breast of Thy loving-kindness, guard it within the cradle of Thy safety and protection and grant that it be reared in the arms of Thy tender affection. (Source category: Children) (Bahaiprayers.net ID: 200)
